description.zh: 國家知識本體架構，包含地理、政治、經濟、文化等多維度分類與語義網絡關聯，旨在建立完整的國家特徵與屬性知識體系，支持跨語言信息檢索與知識挖掘
description.en: National knowledge ontology framework encompassing multi-dimensional classifications and semantic networks related to geography, politics, economy, and culture, aimed at establishing a comprehensive knowledge system of national characteristics and attributes to support cross-lingual information retrieval and knowledge mining

en: subject of domestic and international law

coverage_scope.organizational: 聯合國成員國及其他政治實體

related_to: 去中心化/地方自治程度

items.zh: 去中心化/地方自治程度

concepts.zh: 去中心化/地方自治程度

en: subject of domestic and international law

related_to: 下水道與廢物處理系統
再生資源回收與循環經濟
下水道與廢物處理系統

items.zh: 下水道與廢物處理系統

concepts.zh: 下水道與廢物處理系統

related_to: 非傳染性疾病流行情況

items.zh: 非傳染性疾病流行情況

concepts.zh: 非傳染性疾病流行情況

非傳染性疾病流行情況
公共衛生緊急事件應對

en: subject of domestic and international law

items.zh: 公共衛生緊急事件應對

concepts.zh: 公共衛生緊急事件應對

tw-description.zh: 台灣國家知識庫是一個全面性的數位資料庫，旨在系統化整理並呈現有關台灣作為國家實體的多維度知識。本知識庫涵蓋政治、歷史、文化、地理、經濟、社會等各個層面，為學術研究、政策制定、國際交流及公民教育提供權威參考資源。
tw-description.en: The Taiwan National Knowledge Database is a comprehensive digital repository designed to systematically organize and present multidimensional knowledge about Taiwan as a national entity. This knowledge base covers political, historical, cultural, geographical, economic, and social aspects, providing authoritative reference resources for academic research, policy formulation, international exchange, and civic education.

en: subject of domestic and international law

coverage_scope.organizational: 中華民國政府及其他相關實體

data_sources: 中華民國政府公開數據

description.zh: 中華民國國旗（青天白日滿地紅）與國徽（青天白日徽）為台灣國家象徵，代表自由民主與主權，用於官方與國際場合
description.en: The Republic of China flag (Blue Sky, White Sun, Red Field) and emblem (Blue Sky with White Sun) are Taiwan’s national symbols, representing freedom, democracy, and sovereignty, used in official and international contexts

example.zh: 青天白日滿地紅與青天白日徽
example.en: Blue Sky, White Sun, Red Field and Blue Sky with White Sun

description.zh: 中華民國國歌《三民主義歌》以孫中山三民主義為基礎，象徵國家理念與團結，常用於正式場合
description.en: The Republic of China national anthem, based on Sun Yat-sen’s Three Principles of the People, symbolizes national ideology and unity, used in formal occasions

example.en: Three Principles of the People

description.zh: 台灣國家象徵包括梅花等自然標誌，代表堅韌與文化認同，廣泛用於文化與官方場合
description.en: Taiwan’s national symbols, including the plum blossom, represent resilience and cultural identity, widely used in cultural and official contexts

example.en: Plum Blossom

description.zh: 台北市為台灣首都，是政治、經濟與文化中心，集中政府機構與國際交流活動
description.en: Taipei City is Taiwan’s capital, serving as the political, economic, and cultural center, hosting government institutions and international activities

example.en: Taipei City

description.zh: 台灣行政區劃包括6直轄市、3省轄市、13縣及眾多鄉鎮，總計約368個次級行政單位
description.en: Taiwan’s administrative divisions include 6 special municipalities, 3 provincial cities, 13 counties, and numerous townships, totaling about 368 sub-administrative units

example.en: 6 special municipalities, 3 provincial cities, 13 counties

description.zh: 中華民國國慶日為10月10日（雙十節），紀念1911年辛亥革命，象徵國家成立與民主精神
description.en: The Republic of China’s National Day is October 10 (Double Tenth Day), commemorating the 1911 Xinhai Revolution, symbolizing national establishment and democratic spirit

example.en: October 10 (Double Tenth Day)

description.zh: 台灣官方時區為UTC+8，稱為台灣標準時間，適用於全島及離島
description.en: Taiwan’s official time zone is UTC+8, known as Taiwan Standard Time, applied across the main island and outlying islands

example.en: UTC+8

description.zh: 台灣國際電話區號為+886，用於國際通訊與全球連繫
description.en: Taiwan’s international dialing code is +886, used for international communication and global connectivity

description.zh: 台灣頂級網域名稱為.tw，代表台灣在網際網路上的數位身份
description.en: Taiwan’s top-level domain name is .tw, representing Taiwan’s digital identity on the internet

example.en: .tw

description.zh: 標準漢語（國語）為台灣官方語言，廣泛用於教育、政府與日常交流，伴隨多種方言與原住民語言
description.en: Standard Chinese (Mandarin) is Taiwan’s official language, widely used in education, government, and daily communication, alongside dialects and indigenous languages

example.en: Standard Chinese (Mandarin)

description.zh: 新台幣（TWD, NT$）為台灣官方貨幣，由中央銀行發行，廣泛用於國內外交易
description.en: The New Taiwan Dollar (TWD, NT$) is Taiwan’s official currency, issued by the Central Bank, widely used in domestic and international transactions

example.en: New Taiwan Dollar (TWD, NT$)

description.zh: 中華民國國家格言「禮義廉恥，國之四維」，反映儒家價值與國家道德理念
description.en: The ROC national motto ‘Propriety, Justice, Integrity, Honor’ reflects Confucian values and national moral principles

example.en: Propriety, Justice, Integrity, Honor

description.zh: 中央山脈為台灣主要山脈，縱貫台灣本島，影響氣候與生態分佈，地震活動頻繁
description.en: The Central Mountain Range is Taiwan’s primary mountain chain, running north-south, influencing climate and ecology, with frequent seismic activity

example.en: Highest peak: Xiuguluan Mountain (3,825 meters)

description.zh: 雪山山脈位於台灣北部，擁有高山生態與豐富生物多樣性，是熱門登山地點
description.en: The Xueshan Range in northern Taiwan features high-altitude ecosystems and rich biodiversity, a popular hiking destination

example.en: Xueshan Main Peak (3,886 meters)

description.zh: 玉山山脈包含台灣最高峰玉山，象徵台灣堅韌精神，具重要生態與文化價值
description.en: The Yushan Range includes Taiwan’s highest peak, Yushan, symbolizing resilience, with significant ecological and cultural value

example.en: Yushan Main Peak (3,952 meters)

description.zh: 阿里山山脈以茶葉種植、原住民文化與千年神木聞名，是台灣重要旅遊與農業區域
description.en: The Alishan Range is renowned for tea cultivation, Indigenous culture, and millennial sacred trees, a key tourism and agricultural region

example.zh: 阿里山森林鐵路與神木
example.en: Alishan Forest Railway and sacred trees

description.zh: 大霸尖山為台灣原住民聖山，擁有獨特地貌與生態，是登山者挑戰目標
description.en: Dabajian Mountain, a sacred site for Taiwan’s Indigenous peoples, features unique geology and ecology, a challenging hiking destination

example.en: Dabajian Mountain (3,492 meters)

description.zh: 陽明山為國家公園，擁有火山地貌、溫泉與豐富植被，鄰近台北市，是旅遊與地質研究熱點
description.en: Yangmingshan National Park features volcanic landscapes, hot springs, and diverse flora, near Taipei, a hub for tourism and geological research

example.zh: 陽明山七星山與小油坑
example.en: Yangmingshan Qixing Mountain and Xiaoyoukeng

description.zh: 大雪山位於中部台灣，以高山生態與珍稀物種聞名，是生態研究與旅遊熱點
description.en: Daxueshan in central Taiwan is known for its high-altitude ecosystems and rare species, a hub for ecological research and tourism

example.en: Daxueshan Main Peak (3,530 meters)

description.zh: 合歡山以高山草原與冬季雪景聞名，是台灣熱門旅遊與生態觀察地點
description.en: Hehuanshan is famous for its alpine meadows and winter snow, a popular tourism and ecological observation site

example.en: Hehuanshan Main Peak (3,417 meters)

description.zh: 奇萊山以險峻地形與高山生態聞名，是台灣登山愛好者的挑戰目標
description.en: Qilai Mountain is known for its rugged terrain and high-altitude ecosystems, a challenging destination for mountaineers

example.en: Qilai Mountain North Peak (3,607 meters)

description.zh: 桃園盆地為北部重要城市化區域，支撐工業與交通發展，是台灣經濟重心
description.en: The Taoyuan Basin is a key urbanized area in northern Taiwan, supporting industrial and transportation development, a major economic hub

example.en: Location of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport

description.zh: 花蓮盆地位於東部台灣，以農業與旅遊業為主，地震活動影響地形
description.en: The Hualien Basin in eastern Taiwan is known for agriculture and tourism, shaped by seismic activity

example.zh: 花蓮市與太魯閣國家公園
example.en: Hualien City and Taroko National Park

description.zh: 台中盆地為中部台灣經濟與文化中心，支持工業與城市發展
description.en: The Taichung Basin is central Taiwan’s economic and cultural hub, supporting industry and urban growth

example.en: Taichung City, population ~2.8 million

description.zh: 嘉南平原為台灣主要農業區，稻米與農產品生產重地，水利系統發達
description.en: The Chianan Plain is Taiwan’s primary agricultural region, a key area for rice and crop production with advanced irrigation systems

example.en: Chianan Irrigation System

description.zh: 屏東平原位於台灣南部，以熱帶水果如芒果、鳳梨聞名，是農業經濟重要支柱
description.en: The Pingtung Plain in southern Taiwan is renowned for tropical fruits like mangoes and pineapples, a key pillar of the agricultural economy

example.en: Pingtung Gaoshu Township mango production area

description.zh: 台南沿海平原以漁業、鹽業和農業為主，擁有豐富歷史遺跡如安平古堡
description.en: The Tainan Coastal Plain supports fisheries, salt production, and agriculture, with rich historical sites like Anping Fort

example.zh: 台南安平漁港與井仔腳瓦盤鹽田
example.en: Tainan Anping Fishing Port and Jingzaijiao Tile-paved Salt Fields

description.zh: 宜蘭平原位於台灣東北部，以稻米生產和自然景觀如冬山河聞名，是農業與旅遊並重區域
description.en: The Yilan Plain in northeastern Taiwan is known for rice production and natural landscapes like the Dongshan River, balancing agriculture and tourism

example.zh: 宜蘭三星鄉稻米產區與冬山河親水公園
example.en: Yilan Sanxing Township rice production area and Dongshan River Water Park

description.zh: 台灣面積約36,197平方公里，包含本島與離島，地形涵蓋高山、平原與海岸，生物多樣性豐富
description.en: Taiwan covers ~36,197 sq km, including the main island and outlying islands, with diverse terrain of mountains, plains, and coasts, rich in biodiversity

example.en: Main island and Penghu, Kinmen, Matsu

description.zh: 台灣離島包括澎湖、金門、馬祖，擁有獨特生態、珊瑚礁與戰地文化，是旅遊與軍事重地
description.en: Taiwan’s outlying islands, including Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu, feature unique ecosystems, coral reefs, and war relics, key for tourism and defense

example.zh: 澎湖玄武岩、金門戰地遺跡
example.en: Penghu basalt formations, Kinmen war relics

description.zh: 台灣海岸線長約1,566公里，東部多斷崖，西部為平原，北部有基隆港，南部有墾丁珊瑚礁，支撐漁業與旅遊
description.en: Taiwan’s coastline, ~1,566 km, features eastern cliffs, western plains, northern Keelung Port, and southern Kenting coral reefs, supporting fisheries and tourism

example.zh: 清水斷崖、野柳地質公園
example.en: Qingshui Cliff, Yehliu Geopark

description.zh: 台灣火山地貌包括陽明山、大屯與基隆火山群，擁有溫泉與獨特地質，吸引旅遊與研究
description.en: Taiwan’s volcanic landforms, including Yangmingshan, Datun, and Keelung volcano groups, feature hot springs and unique geology, attracting tourism and research

example.en: Yangmingshan Xiaoyoukeng, Keelung Islet

description.zh: 日月潭位於南投，是台灣最大淡水湖，以湖光山色與原住民文化聞名，是國際旅遊地標
description.en: Sun Moon Lake in Nantou, Taiwan’s largest freshwater lake, is renowned for its scenic beauty and Indigenous culture, an international tourist landmark

example.en: Sun Moon Lake Wenwu Temple

description.zh: 淡水河為北部台灣主要河流，流經台北市，歷史上為貿易與文化交流要道，現為城市景觀核心
description.en: The Tamsui River, a major river in northern Taiwan, flows through Taipei City, historically a key trade and cultural route, now central to urban landscapes

example.en: Tamsui Old Street and Taipei Bridge

description.zh: 濁水溪為台灣最長河流，流經中部，支持嘉南平原農業，但洪水風險高
description.en: The Zhuoshui River, Taiwan’s longest river, flows through central Taiwan, supporting Chianan Plain agriculture but with high flood risks

example.en: Zhuoshui River Basin, ~186 km long

description.zh: 高屏溪為南部台灣最大河流，支撐屏東平原農業灌溉，颱風季節洪水風險顯著
description.en: The Gaoping River, southern Taiwan’s largest river, supports Pingtung Plain irrigation, with significant flood risks during typhoon season

example.zh: 高屏溪流域，屏東農業灌溉
example.en: Gaoping River Basin, Pingtung irrigation

description.zh: 曾文溪流經南部台灣，為農業與水庫供水重要來源，支援台南與嘉義地區
description.en: The Zengwen River flows through southern Taiwan, a key source for agriculture and reservoir water supply, supporting Tainan and Chiayi

example.en: Zengwen River and Zengwen Reservoir

description.zh: 大甲溪位於中部台灣，支援水力發電與農業灌溉，是台中地區重要水源
description.en: The Dajia River in central Taiwan supports hydropower and agricultural irrigation, a vital water source for Taichung

example.en: Dajia River and Deji Reservoir

description.zh: 大安溪流經苗栗與台中，提供農業灌溉與水資源，支援中部農田
description.en: The Da'an River flows through Miaoli and Taichung, providing agricultural irrigation and water resources for central Taiwan’s farmlands

example.zh: 大安溪流域，苗栗農業區
example.en: Da'an River Basin, Miaoli agricultural area

description.zh: 秀姑巒溪流經東部花蓮，是泛舟與旅遊熱門地點，支援農業與自然生態
description.en: The Xiuguluan River in eastern Hualien is a popular rafting and tourism destination, supporting agriculture and natural ecosystems

example.en: Xiuguluan River rafting route

description.zh: 花蓮溪流經花蓮平原，支援農業灌溉，與地震活動相關，是東部水資源核心
description.en: The Hualien River flows through the Hualien Plain, supporting agricultural irrigation, linked to seismic activity, a key eastern water resource

example.en: Hualien River Basin and agriculture

description.zh: 蘭陽溪流經宜蘭平原，支援稻米與農業生產，是宜蘭重要水源與旅遊景觀
description.en: The Lanyang River flows through the Yilan Plain, supporting rice and agriculture, a key water source and tourism site in Yilan

example.en: Lanyang River and Sanxing Township agriculture

description.zh: 鹽水溪流經台南，支援農業與水資源管理，與當地歷史文化密切相關
description.en: The Yanshui River flows through Tainan, supporting agriculture and water management, closely tied to local history and culture

example.en: Yanshui River and Tainan agriculture

description.zh: The Keelung River flows through Taipei City, supporting urban development and water resources, a key northern Taipei river.
description.en: 基隆河流經台北市，支援城市發展與水資源，是台北北部重要河川

example.zh: Keelung River and Taipei urban area
example.en: 基隆河與台北市區

description.zh: 石門水庫位於桃園，為北部水資源與農業灌溉核心，也是旅遊與休閒地點
description.en: Shimen Reservoir in Taoyuan is a core northern water resource and irrigation hub, also a tourism and leisure site

example.en: Shimen Reservoir and Taoyuan agriculture

description.zh: 烏山頭水庫為嘉南平原農業灌溉核心，建於日治時期，具有歷史與文化價值
description.en: Wushantou Reservoir is central to Chianan Plain irrigation, built during Japanese rule, with historical and cultural significance

example.zh: 烏山頭水庫與嘉南大圳
example.en: Wushantou Reservoir and Chianan Irrigation System

description.zh: 基隆斷層位於基隆至台北北部，為逆斷層，靠近火山地貌，地震風險中等，影響基隆港與北部都會區
description.en: The Keelung Fault, a thrust fault from Keelung to northern Taipei, near volcanic landscapes, poses moderate seismic risk, affecting Keelung Port and urban areas

example.en: Keelung Earthquake Monitoring Station

description.zh: 山腳斷層位於新北市與桃園交界，沿台北盆地邊緣，為逆斷層，潛在地震風險高，影響北部防災
description.en: The Shanjiao Fault, a thrust fault along the Taipei Basin’s edge in New Taipei and Taoyuan, poses high seismic risk, critical for northern disaster planning

example.en: New Taipei City earthquake simulation studies

description.zh: 鹿野斷層位於台東鹿野鄉，屬花東縱谷斷層系，為走滑斷層，多次引發中小型地震，具研究價值
description.en: The Luye Fault in Taitung’s Luye Township, part of the Longitudinal Valley Fault, a strike-slip fault, triggers frequent small to moderate earthquakes, valuable for research

example.en: Luye Fault Observatory, Taitung

description.zh: 車籠埔斷層位於中部台灣，長約90公里，為逆斷層，引發1999年921大地震（M7.3），對地質研究與防災影響深遠
description.en: The Chelungpu Fault, a 90-km thrust fault in central Taiwan, caused the 1999 921 Earthquake (M7.3), significantly impacting geological research and disaster preparedness

example.en: 921 Earthquake Museum, Wufeng, Taichung

description.zh: 梅山斷層位於嘉義梅山鄉，為走滑斷層，引發1906年梅山地震（M7.1），與多次中小型地震相關，對南部防災至關重要
description.en: The Meishan Fault, a strike-slip fault in Chiayi’s Meishan Township, caused the 1906 Meishan Earthquake (M7.1) and multiple moderate events, critical for southern disaster research

example.zh: 梅山地震監測站，嘉義市
example.en: Meishan Earthquake Monitoring Station, Chiayi City

description.zh: 濁水溪斷層沿濁水溪流域分佈，長約60公里，為中部地震活躍帶，對雲林、彰化地質監測與防災意義重大
description.en: The Zhuoshui River Fault, a 60-km seismically active zone along the Zhuoshui River basin in central Taiwan, is significant for Yunlin and Changhua monitoring

example.zh: 濁水溪斷層，雲林斗六地震研究站
example.en: Zhuoshui River Fault, Douliu Seismic Station, Yunlin

description.zh: 台北斷層位於台北盆地，長約20公里，為逆斷層，潛在地震規模M6.5–7.0，影響台北都會區防災規劃
description.en: The Taipei Fault, a 20-km thrust fault in the Taipei Basin, with potential M6.5–7.0 earthquakes, is critical for Taipei metropolitan disaster planning

example.zh: 台北盆地地震模擬研究站
example.en: Taipei Basin Earthquake Simulation Research Station

description.zh: 花東縱谷斷層沿花蓮至台東縱谷分佈，長約150公里，為台灣東部最活躍地震帶，引發2018年花蓮地震（M6.4）
description.en: The Hualien-Taitung Longitudinal Valley Fault, a 150-km seismic zone along the eastern valley, caused the 2018 Hualien Earthquake (M6.4), Taiwan’s most active fault

example.zh: 花蓮地震監測網，2018年地震
example.en: Hualien Earthquake Monitoring Network, 2018 Earthquake

description.zh: 池上斷層位於台東池上鄉，屬花東縱谷斷層系，活動速率約1–2公分/年，多次引發中小型地震，具地質研究價值
description.en: The Chishang Fault in Taitung’s Chishang Township, part of the Longitudinal Valley Fault, with a 1–2 cm/year slip rate, triggers frequent small to moderate earthquakes

example.en: Chishang Fault Observatory, Taitung

description.zh: 旗山斷層位於高雄旗山，長約30公里，為逆斷層，引發2010年甲仙地震（M6.4），對南部防災意義重大
description.en: The Qishan Fault, a 30-km thrust fault in Kaohsiung’s Qishan, caused the 2010 Jiaxian Earthquake (M6.4), significant for southern disaster prevention

example.en: Qishan Earthquake Monitoring Station, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 六龜斷層位於高雄六龜，靠近中央山脈，為逆斷層，與南部地震活躍帶相關，影響高屏溪流域防災
description.en: The Liugui Fault, a thrust fault in Kaohsiung’s Liugui near the Central Mountain Range, is linked to southern seismic activity, affecting Gaoping River basin disaster prevention

example.en: Liugui Earthquake Monitoring Station, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 米崙斷層位於花蓮市，長約10公里，為走滑斷層，引發2018年花蓮地震（M6.4），影響東部城市防災
description.en: The Milun Fault, a 10-km strike-slip fault in Hualien City, caused the 2018 Hualien Earthquake (M6.4), critical for eastern urban disaster planning

description.zh: 亞熱帶氣候為台灣主要氣候類型，夏季溫暖潮濕（25-30°C，濕度80-90%），冬季溫和（15-20°C），年降雨量約2000-2500毫米，影響北部及中部地區
description.en: Subtropical climate dominates Taiwan, with warm, humid summers (25-30°C, 80-90% humidity), mild winters (15-20°C), and ~2000-2500 mm annual rainfall, affecting northern and central regions

example.en: Taipei City and Taichung City

description.zh: 熱帶氣候見於台灣南部，氣溫高（28-32°C，濕度75-85%），季節變化小，年降雨量約2000毫米，影響屏東及高雄地區
description.en: Tropical climate occurs in southern Taiwan, with high temperatures (28-32°C, 75-85% humidity), minimal seasonal variation, and ~2000 mm annual rainfall, affecting Pingtung and Kaohsiung

example.en: Kaohsiung City and Pingtung County

description.zh: 台灣區域氣候差異顯著，東部多雨（年降雨量可達4000毫米），西部較乾旱（2000毫米），北部涼爽（15-25°C），南部炎熱（25-32°C）
description.en: Taiwan’s regional climate varies, with wet eastern coasts (up to 4000 mm rainfall), drier western plains (2000 mm), cooler north (15-25°C), and hotter south (25-32°C)

example.zh: 宜蘭縣（多雨東部）與台南市（乾燥西部）
example.en: Yilan County (wet east) and Tainan City (dry west)

description.zh: 台灣山區氣候隨海拔變化，氣溫較低（冬季5-15°C，濕度85-95%），降雨量高（2500-3000毫米），常見雲霧，影響阿里山、玉山
description.en: Taiwan’s mountain climate varies with elevation, with cooler temperatures (5-15°C in winter, 85-95% humidity), high rainfall (2500-3000 mm), and frequent fog, affecting Alishan and Yushan

example.en: Alishan and Yushan

description.zh: 台灣海岸氣候受海洋調節，濕度高（80-90%），溫差小，夏季溫暖（25-30°C），冬季溫和（18-22°C），影響基隆、高雄
description.en: Taiwan’s coastal climate is moderated by the ocean, with high humidity (80-90%), small temperature swings, warm summers (25-30°C), and mild winters (18-22°C), affecting Keelung and Kaohsiung

example.en: Keelung City and Kaohsiung City

description.zh: 台灣微氣候因地形與城市化形成，如台北盆地熱島效應（高2-3°C），宜蘭沿海霧氣（濕度90-95%），影響局部農業與生活
description.en: Taiwan’s microclimates arise from terrain and urbanization, e.g., Taipei Basin’s heat island effect (2-3°C warmer), coastal fog in Yilan (90-95% humidity), impacting local agriculture and life

example.zh: 台北盆地（熱島）與宜蘭沿海（霧氣）
example.en: Taipei Basin (heat island) and Yilan Coast (fog)

description.zh: 海洋性氣候調節台灣沿海地區，減少氣溫極端（年溫差5-10°C），增加濕度（80-90%），影響港口城市如台南、基隆
description.en: Oceanic climate moderates Taiwan’s coastal areas, reducing temperature extremes (annual range 5-10°C), increasing humidity (80-90%), affecting port cities like Tainan and Keelung

example.en: Tainan City and Keelung City

description.zh: 城市熱島效應使台灣都市氣溫升高2-3°C，夏季可達33-35°C（濕度75-85%），影響台北、高雄，增加空調需求
description.en: Urban heat island effect raises Taiwan’s city temperatures by 2-3°C, reaching 33-35°C in summer (75-85% humidity), affecting Taipei and Kaohsiung, increasing cooling needs

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City

description.zh: 高山氣候見於台灣海拔3000米以上地區，冬季氣溫可降至0°C以下，降雨量高（2000-3000毫米），影響玉山、雪山
description.en: Alpine climate occurs in Taiwan’s regions above 3000m, with winter temperatures below 0°C, high rainfall (2000-3000 mm), affecting Yushan and Xueshan

example.en: Yushan and Xueshan

description.zh: 季風影響台灣降雨，東北季風（10-3月）帶來北部降雨（200-300毫米/月），西南季風（5-9月）影響南部，年降雨量2000-4000毫米
description.en: Monsoons drive Taiwan’s rainfall, with northeast monsoon (Oct-Mar) affecting the north (200-300 mm/month) and southwest monsoon (May-Sep) the south, yielding 2000-4000 mm annually

example.zh: 台北（東北季風）與高雄（西南季風）
example.en: Taipei (northeast monsoon) and Kaohsiung (southwest monsoon)

description.zh: 颱風季節（6-10月，峰值7-9月）每年影響台灣3-4次，風速>33米/秒，單日降雨可達500毫米，影響宜蘭、台北、高雄
description.en: Typhoon season (Jun-Oct, peaking Jul-Sep) brings 3-4 typhoons annually to Taiwan, with winds >33 m/s, up to 500 mm/day rainfall, impacting Yilan, Taipei, Kaohsiung

example.zh: 宜蘭縣與高雄市受颱風影響
example.en: Yilan County and Kaohsiung City affected by typhoons

description.zh: 梅雨季（5-6月，持續30-40天）為台灣北部及中部帶來持續降雨，月降雨量300-500毫米，影響台北、台中農業與水資源
description.en: Plum Rain Season (May-Jun, ~30-40 days) brings persistent rain to northern and central Taiwan, with 300-500 mm monthly rainfall, affecting agriculture and water resources in Taipei and Taichung

example.en: Taipei City and Taichung City

description.zh: 乾季（11-3月）影響台灣西部，降雨量低（50-100毫米/月），氣溫溫和（15-22°C，濕度70-80%），見於台南、屏東
description.en: Dry season (Nov-Mar) affects western Taiwan, with low rainfall (50-100 mm/month), mild temperatures (15-22°C, 70-80% humidity), seen in Tainan and Pingtung

example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County

description.zh: 濕季（5-9月）為台灣高降雨期，月降雨量200-400毫米，受季風與颱風影響，見於宜蘭、台北、台東
description.en: Wet season (May-Sep) brings high rainfall (200-400 mm/month) to Taiwan, driven by monsoons and typhoons, affecting Yilan, Taipei, Taitung

example.en: Yilan County and Taitung County

description.zh: 東北季風（10-3月）帶來強風（10-20米/秒）與降雨，影響北部及東北部，基隆、台北降雨量增加（200-300毫米/月）
description.en: Northeast monsoon (Oct-Mar) brings strong winds (10-20 m/s) and rain to northern and northeastern Taiwan, increasing rainfall (200-300 mm/month) in Keelung and Taipei

example.en: Keelung City and Taipei City

description.zh: 寒流（12-2月）影響台灣北部，氣溫降至10°C以下（最低5-8°C），影響台北、新北，伴隨降雨與強風，增加取暖需求
description.en: Cold waves (Dec-Feb) affect northern Taiwan, dropping temperatures below 10°C (min 5-8°C) in Taipei and New Taipei, with rain and strong winds, increasing heating needs

example.en: Taipei City and New Taipei City

items.en: Cold Surges and Low Temperature Events

concepts.en: Cold Surges and Low Temperature Events

description.zh: 寒潮與低溫事件為台灣高山地區罕見極端天氣，氣溫可降至0°C以下，影響玉山、阿里山，偶有霜凍或降雪
description.en: Cold surges and low temperature events are rare in Taiwan’s highlands, with temperatures below 0°C, affecting Yushan and Alishan, occasionally causing frost or snow

example.en: Yushan and Alishan

description.zh: 熱浪事件（7-8月）使台灣南部氣溫超過35°C（濕度75-85%），影響高雄、屏東，增加中暑風險與能源需求
description.en: Heatwaves (Jul-Aug) push southern Taiwan temperatures above 35°C (75-85% humidity), affecting Kaohsiung and Pingtung, raising heatstroke risks and energy demand

example.en: Kaohsiung City and Pingtung County

description.zh: 霧氣事件常見於台灣東北部沿海（10-3月），濕度達95-100%，影響宜蘭、花蓮，降低能見度，影響農業與交通
description.en: Fog events are common on Taiwan’s northeastern coast (Oct-Mar), with 95-100% humidity, affecting Yilan and Hualien, reducing visibility and impacting agriculture and traffic

example.en: Yilan County and Hualien County

description.zh: 台灣年均溫北部約22-25°C，南部24-27°C，城市地區因熱島效應高1-2°C，影響台北、高雄生活與農業
description.en: Taiwan’s annual average temperature is ~22-25°C in the north, 24-27°C in the south, 1-2°C higher in cities due to heat island effect, affecting life and agriculture in Taipei, Kaohsiung

example.en: Taipei City (23°C) and Kaohsiung City (26°C)

description.zh: 台灣年降雨量平均2000-2500毫米，東部可達4000毫米，西部1500-2000毫米，影響宜蘭、台南水資源與農業
description.en: Taiwan’s annual rainfall averages 2000-2500 mm, up to 4000 mm in the east, 1500-2000 mm in the west, affecting water resources and agriculture in Yilan, Tainan

example.zh: 宜蘭縣（4000毫米）與台南市（1800毫米）
example.en: Yilan County (4000 mm) and Tainan City (1800 mm)

description.zh: 台灣平均相對濕度75-90%，沿海地區達85-95%，影響基隆、高雄舒適度與農業灌溉
description.en: Taiwan’s average relative humidity is 75-90%, reaching 85-95% in coastal areas, affecting comfort and agriculture in Keelung, Kaohsiung

example.en: Keelung City (90%) and Kaohsiung City (85%)

description.zh: 台灣年均風速3-5米/秒，沿海及東北部達5-8米/秒，影響基隆、宜蘭風力發電與航運
description.en: Taiwan’s annual average wind speed is 3-5 m/s, reaching 5-8 m/s in coastal and northeastern areas, affecting wind power and shipping in Keelung, Yilan

example.zh: 基隆市（6米/秒）與宜蘭縣（7米/秒）
example.en: Keelung City (6 m/s) and Yilan County (7 m/s)

description.zh: 台灣年日照時數1800-2200小時，西部較高（2000-2200小時），東部較低（1600-1800小時），影響台南、屏東太陽能與農業
description.en: Taiwan’s annual sunshine hours are 1800-2200, higher in the west (2000-2200 hours), lower in the east (1600-1800 hours), affecting solar energy and agriculture in Tainan, Pingtung

example.zh: 台南市（2100小時）與宜蘭縣（1700小時）
example.en: Tainan City (2100 hours) and Yilan County (1700 hours)

description.zh: 台灣氣壓年均1000-1020百帕，颱風期間降至950-980百帕，影響台北、高雄天氣預報與航運安全
description.en: Taiwan’s average atmospheric pressure is 1000-1020 hPa, dropping to 950-980 hPa during typhoons, affecting weather forecasts and shipping safety in Taipei, Kaohsiung

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（颱風低壓）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (typhoon low pressure)

description.zh: 台灣年蒸發量1200-1800毫米，南部較高（1500-1800毫米），影響高雄、屏東水資源與灌溉需求
description.en: Taiwan’s annual evaporation is 1200-1800 mm, higher in the south (1500-1800 mm), affecting water resources and irrigation in Kaohsiung, Pingtung

example.zh: 高雄市（1700毫米）與屏東縣（1600毫米）
example.en: Kaohsiung City (1700 mm) and Pingtung County (1600 mm)

description.zh: 台灣降雪頻率極低，年均<1天，僅限海拔3000米以上高山如玉山、雪山，影響高山生態與旅遊
description.en: Taiwan’s snowfall frequency is <1 day/year, limited to mountains above 3000m like Yushan, Xueshan, affecting alpine ecology and tourism

example.en: Yushan and Xueshan (winter snowfall)

description.zh: 台灣霧日數東北部30-60天/年，濕度95-100%，影響宜蘭、花蓮交通與農業生產
description.en: Taiwan’s fog days number 30-60/year in the northeast, with 95-100% humidity, affecting traffic and agriculture in Yilan, Hualien

example.en: Yilan County (50 days) and Hualien County (40 days)

description.zh: 台灣年均颱風頻率3-4次（6-10月），風速>33米/秒，影響台北、高雄、宜蘭，帶來強降雨與經濟損失
description.en: Taiwan’s annual typhoon frequency is 3-4 (Jun-Oct), with winds >33 m/s, affecting Taipei, Kaohsiung, Yilan, causing heavy rain and economic losses

example.zh: 台北市與宜蘭縣（颱風影響）
example.en: Taipei City and Yilan County (typhoon impacts)

description.zh: 乾旱現象每5-10年影響台灣西南部，降雨量<1000毫米/年，影響台南、屏東、高雄農業與水庫（如2021年危機），損失約NT$5億
description.en: Droughts affect southwestern Taiwan every 5-10 years, with rainfall <1000 mm/year, impacting agriculture and reservoirs in Tainan, Pingtung, Kaohsiung (e.g., 2021 crisis), losses ~NT$0.5 billion

example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County (2021 drought)

description.zh: 強降雨事件由颱風或梅雨引發，單日降雨>500毫米，導致台北、高雄洪水，年損失約NT$5-10億，影響10-20萬居民
description.en: Heavy rainfall events, driven by typhoons or plum rain, exceed 500 mm/day, causing flooding in Taipei, Kaohsiung, with losses ~NT$5-10 billion, affecting 100,000-200,000 residents

example.zh: 台北市（颱風豪雨）與高雄市（梅雨洪水）
example.en: Taipei City (typhoon deluge) and Kaohsiung City (plum rain floods)

description.zh: 都市洪水風險因強降雨與排水不足加劇，影響台北、高雄低窪區，年均影響10-15萬居民，損失NT$2-5億
description.en: Urban flood risk, worsened by heavy rain and poor drainage, affects low-lying areas in Taipei, Kaohsiung, impacting 100,000-150,000 residents yearly, losses ~NT$2-5 billion

example.zh: 台北市中山區與高雄市前鎮區
example.en: Zhongshan District, Taipei, and Qianzhen District, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 山崩與土石流由颱風強降雨引發，年均100-200次，影響台中、南投山區，損失約NT$1-3億，威脅道路與村落
description.en: Landslides and debris flows, triggered by typhoon heavy rain, occur 100-200 times/year, affecting Taichung, Nantou mountains, losses ~NT$1-3 billion, threatening roads and villages

example.zh: 台中市和平區與南投縣仁愛鄉
example.en: Heping District, Taichung, and Ren’ai Township, Nantou

items.zh: 海岸侵蝕與海平面上升
items.en: Coastal Erosion and Sea Level Rise

concepts.zh: 海岸侵蝕與海平面上升
concepts.en: Coastal Erosion and Sea Level Rise

description.zh: 海平面上升（年均3-5毫米）與颱風加劇台灣海岸侵蝕，影響高雄、新北沿海，損失約NT$0.5-1億，威脅基礎設施
description.en: Sea level rise (3-5 mm/year) and typhoons exacerbate coastal erosion in Taiwan, affecting Kaohsiung, New Taipei coasts, losses ~NT$0.5-1 billion, threatening infrastructure

example.zh: 高雄市旗津區與新北市淡水區
example.en: Qijin District, Kaohsiung, and Tamsui District, New Taipei

description.zh: 暴潮與風暴潮由颱風引發，海水淹沒台南、高雄沿海低地，年均1-2次，損失約NT$1-2億，影響漁業與居民
description.en: Storm surges, triggered by typhoons, flood coastal lowlands in Tainan, Kaohsiung 1-2 times/year, losses ~NT$1-2 billion, affecting fisheries and residents

example.zh: 台南市安平區與高雄市旗津區
example.en: Anping District, Tainan, and Qijin District, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 極端低溫（<0°C）罕見於台灣高山，影響玉山、阿里山，年均0-1次，導致霜凍，影響高山農業與生態
description.en: Extreme low temperatures (<0°C) are rare in Taiwan’s highlands, affecting Yushan, Alishan 0-1 times/year, causing frost, impacting alpine agriculture and ecology

example.zh: 玉山與阿里山（冬季霜凍）
example.en: Yushan and Alishan (winter frost)

items.zh: 厄爾尼諾與拉尼娜效應
items.en: El Niño and La Niña Effects

concepts.zh: 厄爾尼諾與拉尼娜效應
concepts.en: El Niño and La Niña Effects

description.zh: 厄爾尼諾與拉尼娜影響台灣降雨與颱風，厄爾尼諾帶來濕冬（降雨+20-30%），拉尼娜增強颱風（頻率+10-20%），影響台北、高雄
description.en: El Niño and La Niña affect Taiwan’s rainfall and typhoons, with El Niño causing wetter winters (+20-30% rainfall) and La Niña increasing typhoon frequency (+10-20%), impacting Taipei, Kaohsiung

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City

description.zh: 台灣氣溫上升速率約0.5°C/十年，高於全球0.2°C/十年，1980至今升溫1.5°C，影響台北、高雄農業與能源需求
description.en: Taiwan’s temperature rises at ~0.5°C/decade, above global 0.2°C/decade, with 1.5°C warming since 1980, affecting agriculture and energy in Taipei, Kaohsiung

example.en: Taipei City (+1.6°C) and Kaohsiung City (+1.4°C)

description.zh: 台灣海平面上升3-5毫米/年，預估2050年升12-20厘米，影響台南、高雄沿海，增加洪水與侵蝕風險
description.en: Taiwan’s sea level rises 3-5 mm/year, projected to increase 12-20 cm by 2050, affecting Tainan, Kaohsiung coasts, increasing flood and erosion risks

example.zh: 台南市安平區與高雄市旗津區
example.en: Anping District, Tainan, and Qijin District, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 氣候變遷使台灣颱風強度增加10-20%，風速>40米/秒，降雨量+15%，影響台北、宜蘭，損失增至NT$15-25億/年
description.en: Climate change increases Taiwan’s typhoon intensity by 10-20%, with winds >40 m/s, rainfall +15%, affecting Taipei, Yilan, losses rising to NT$15-25 billion/year

example.en: Taipei City and Yilan County

description.zh: 台灣西南部乾旱趨勢加劇，乾季降雨量減少20-30%，影響台南、屏東農業，2050年乾旱頻率或增50%
description.en: Southwestern Taiwan faces worsening drought trends, with 20-30% less dry season rainfall, affecting Tainan, Pingtung agriculture, drought frequency may rise 50% by 2050

example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County

description.zh: 氣候變遷使台灣東部降雨增加10-20%（達4500毫米/年），西部減少10%，影響宜蘭水資源與台南農業
description.en: Climate change increases eastern Taiwan rainfall by 10-20% (up to 4500 mm/year), reduces western rainfall by 10%, affecting Yilan water resources and Tainan agriculture

example.zh: 宜蘭縣（增雨）與台南市（減雨）
example.en: Yilan County (increased rain) and Tainan City (reduced rain)

description.zh: 氣候變遷導致台灣珊瑚白化（屏東墾丁30%受影響）與高山物種減少，影響生態旅遊與漁業，損失約NT$0.5億/年
description.en: Climate change causes coral bleaching (30% affected in Kenting, Pingtung) and alpine species decline, impacting ecotourism and fisheries, losses ~NT$0.5 billion/year

example.zh: 屏東縣墾丁與玉山生態區
example.en: Kenting, Pingtung, and Yushan Ecological Zone

description.zh: 氣候變遷使台灣熱浪、洪水頻率增加15-20%，年均災害損失增至NT$20-30億，影響台北、高雄都市與農業
description.en: Climate change increases Taiwan’s heatwave and flood frequency by 15-20%, with annual disaster losses rising to NT$20-30 billion, affecting Taipei, Kaohsiung urban and agricultural areas

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City

description.zh: 氣候變遷使台灣沿海pH值下降0.1-0.2，影響高雄、屏東漁業與珊瑚生態，預估2050年損失NT$0.3-0.5億
description.en: Climate change reduces Taiwan’s coastal pH by 0.1-0.2, affecting Kaohsiung, Pingtung fisheries and coral ecosystems, projected losses NT$0.3-0.5 billion by 2050

example.en: Kaohsiung City and Pingtung County coasts

description.zh: 中央氣象署颱風預警系統提前24-48小時發布警報，覆蓋95%台灣人口，減少台北、宜蘭損失約NT$5-10億/年
description.en: Central Weather Bureau’s typhoon early warning system issues alerts 24-48 hours in advance, covering 95% of Taiwan’s population, reducing losses in Taipei, Yilan by ~NT$5-10 billion/year

example.zh: 台北市與宜蘭縣（颱風警報）
example.en: Taipei City and Yilan County (typhoon alerts)

description.zh: 台灣洪水防禦包括基隆河堤防與高雄排水系統，保護100-150萬居民，年均減少損失NT$3-7億
description.en: Taiwan’s flood defenses, including Keelung River levees and Kaohsiung drainage systems, protect 1-1.5 million residents, reducing losses by ~NT$3-7 billion/year

example.zh: 台北市基隆河與高雄市愛河
example.en: Keelung River, Taipei, and Love River, Kaohsiung

description.zh: 乾旱管理包括曾文水庫調配與台南節水措施，保護50萬居民與農業，2021年節省NT$1-2億損失
description.en: Drought management, including Zengwen Reservoir allocation and Tainan water conservation, protects 500,000 residents and agriculture, saving NT$1-2 billion in 2021

example.zh: 台南市與屏東縣（曾文水庫）
example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County (Zengwen Reservoir)

description.zh: 海岸保護工程包括高雄海堤與新北防波堤，保護20萬沿海居民，減少海平面上升損失約NT$0.5-1億/年
description.en: Coastal protection projects, including Kaohsiung seawalls and New Taipei breakwaters, protect 200,000 coastal residents, reducing sea level rise losses by ~NT$0.5-1 billion/year

example.zh: 高雄市旗津區與新北市淡水區
example.en: Qijin District, Kaohsiung, and Tamsui District, New Taipei

description.zh: 歷史颱風如2009年莫拉克（600毫米/天，損失NT$110億）影響高雄、屏東，提供災害應對經驗教訓
description.en: Historical typhoons like Morakot 2009 (600 mm/day, NT$110 billion loss) affected Kaohsiung, Pingtung, providing lessons for disaster response

example.zh: 高雄市與屏東縣（莫拉克颱風）
example.en: Kaohsiung City and Pingtung County (Typhoon Morakot)

description.zh: 歷史乾旱如2021年事件影響台南、屏東20%農地，損失NT$5億，促使水資源管理改善
description.en: Historical droughts like 2021 affected 20% of farmland in Tainan, Pingtung, losses NT$0.5 billion, prompting water resource management improvements

example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County (2021 drought)

description.zh: 災害復原計畫包括台北、高雄重建與補償，恢復10-15萬受災居民生活，年均投入NT$2-4億
description.en: Disaster recovery plans, including Taipei, Kaohsiung rebuilding and compensation, restore 100,000-150,000 affected residents, annual investment ~NT$2-4 billion

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（洪水後重建）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (post-flood recovery)

description.zh: 氣候適應城市規劃如台北海綿城市與高雄綠建築，減少洪水與熱浪影響，保護50萬居民，節省NT$1-2億/年
description.en: Climate-resilient urban planning, like Taipei’s sponge city and Kaohsiung’s green buildings, reduces flood and heatwave impacts, protecting 500,000 residents, saving NT$1-2 billion/year

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（海綿城市）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (sponge city)

description.zh: 中央氣象署預報系統整合雷達與衛星數據，覆蓋90%台灣，預測颱風與降雨，減少台北、高雄損失約NT$5億/年
description.en: Central Weather Bureau’s forecasting system integrates radar and satellite data, covering 90% of Taiwan, predicting typhoons and rainfall, reducing losses in Taipei, Kaohsiung by ~NT$0.5 billion/year

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（颱風預報）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (typhoon forecasts)

description.zh: 台灣7座多普勒雷達站（台北、高雄等）監測降雨與颱風，精確度達90%，提升災害預警，保護200萬居民
description.en: Taiwan’s 7 Doppler radar stations (Taipei, Kaohsiung, etc.) monitor rainfall and typhoons with 90% accuracy, enhancing disaster warnings, protecting 2 million residents

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市雷達站
example.en: Taipei and Kaohsiung radar stations

description.zh: 福爾摩沙衛星系列監測台灣天氣，覆蓋95%海域，支援宜蘭、花蓮颱風路徑預測，減少損失約NT$0.3億/年
description.en: FORMOSAT satellites monitor Taiwan’s weather, covering 95% of maritime areas, supporting typhoon path predictions in Yilan, Hualien, reducing losses by ~NT$0.3 billion/year

example.zh: 宜蘭縣與花蓮縣（衛星預測）
example.en: Yilan County and Hualien County (satellite predictions)

description.zh: 台灣氣候變遷推估計畫（TCCIP）模擬2050年氣溫升1.5-2°C，支援台北、高雄適應計畫，節省NT$0.5-1億/年
description.en: Taiwan Climate Change Projection (TCCIP) simulates 1.5-2°C warming by 2050, supporting adaptation plans in Taipei, Kaohsiung, saving NT$0.5-1 billion/year

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（氣候模型）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (climate models)

description.zh: 台灣400個雨量站監測降雨，覆蓋80%土地，支援宜蘭、台南洪水預警，減少損失約NT$0.2億/年
description.en: Taiwan’s 400 rain gauges monitor rainfall, covering 80% of land, supporting flood warnings in Yilan, Tainan, reducing losses by ~NT$0.2 billion/year

example.zh: 宜蘭縣與台南市（雨量站）
example.en: Yilan County and Tainan City (rain gauges)

description.zh: 海洋浮標監測台灣海域溫度與海流，支援高雄、基隆颱風與海平面預測，覆蓋70%沿海，節省NT$0.1億/年
description.en: Ocean buoys monitor Taiwan’s sea temperature and currents, supporting typhoon and sea level predictions in Kaohsiung, Keelung, covering 70% of coasts, saving NT$0.1 billion/year

example.zh: 高雄市與基隆市（海洋浮標）
example.en: Kaohsiung City and Keelung City (ocean buoys)

description.zh: AI天氣預報提升颱風路徑預測精確度至85%，支援台北、高雄災害應對，減少損失約NT$0.3億/年
description.en: AI weather forecasting improves typhoon path accuracy to 85%, supporting disaster response in Taipei, Kaohsiung, reducing losses by ~NT$0.3 billion/year

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (AI forecasts)

description.zh: 中央氣象署數據平台提供即時天氣資訊，覆蓋90%台灣人口，支援台北、高雄公眾與企業決策，節省NT$0.2億/年
description.en: Central Weather Bureau’s data platform provides real-time weather info, covering 90% of Taiwan’s population, supporting public and business decisions in Taipei, Kaohsiung, saving NT$0.2 billion/year

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (CWB platform)

description.zh: 晴朗無雲天氣無雲覆蓋，陽光充足，濕度60-70%，發生於乾季（11-3月），影響台南、屏東約20-30%天數，利於戶外活動
description.en: Clear sky weather has 0% cloud cover, ample sunshine, 60-70% humidity, occurring in dry season (Nov-Mar), affecting Tainan, Pingtung ~20-30% of days, ideal for outdoor activities

example.zh: 台南市與屏東縣（乾季晴天）
example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County (dry season clear sky)

description.zh: 少雲天氣雲覆蓋10-25%，陽光充足，濕度65-75%，常見於台南乾季（11-3月），影響農業與旅遊，約15-20%天數
description.en: Few clouds weather has 10-25% cloud cover, ample sunshine, 65-75% humidity, common in Tainan’s dry season (Nov-Mar), affecting agriculture and tourism, ~15-20% of days

description.en: Hailstorms bring 5-20 mm ice pellets, 80-90% humidity, affecting Taipei <0.5% of days, causing vehicle and crop damage

example.en: Taipei City (hailstorm)

description.zh: 強陣風風速15-25米/秒，濕度80-90%，影響高雄約3%天數，常伴雷雨，影響戶外安全與航運
description.en: Squalls with winds 15-25 m/s, 80-90% humidity, affecting Kaohsiung ~3% of days, often with thunderstorms, impacting outdoor safety and shipping

example.en: Kaohsiung City (squall)

description.zh: 沙塵暴能見度<1公里，濕度50-60%，極罕見於台南（<0.1%天數），影響空氣品質與交通安全
description.en: Dust storms with visibility <1 km, 50-60% humidity, extremely rare in Tainan (<0.1% of days), impacting air quality and traffic safety

example.en: Tainan City (rare dust storm)

description.zh: 清新空氣AQI<50，PM2.5<15µg/m³，濕度60-70%，影響宜蘭約40%天數，常見於乾季（11-3月），利於戶外活動與健康
description.en: Clean air with AQI<50, PM2.5<15µg/m³, 60-70% humidity, affects Yilan ~40% of days, common in dry season (Nov-Mar), ideal for outdoor activities and health

example.en: Yilan County (dry season clean air)

description.zh: 輕度污染AQI 51-100，PM2.5 15-35µg/m³，濕度70-80%，影響台北約25%天數，冬季（12-2月）常見，輕微影響敏感人群
description.en: Slight pollution with AQI 51-100, PM2.5 15-35µg/m³, 70-80% humidity, affects Taipei ~25% of days, common in winter (Dec-Feb), slightly impacting sensitive groups

example.en: Taipei City (winter slight pollution)

description.zh: 中度污染AQI 101-150，PM2.5 35-55µg/m³，濕度75-85%，影響台北、高雄約15%天數，影響呼吸道健康，建議減少戶外活動
description.en: Moderate pollution with AQI 101-150, PM2.5 35-55µg/m³, 75-85% humidity, affects Taipei, Kaohsiung ~15% of days, impacting respiratory health, outdoor activity reduction advised

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（中度污染）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (moderate pollution)

description.zh: 重度污染AQI 151-200，PM2.5 55-75µg/m³，濕度70-80%，影響台北、高雄約5%天數，冬季偶發，嚴重影響健康，建議室內避難
description.en: Heavy pollution with AQI 151-200, PM2.5 55-75µg/m³, 70-80% humidity, affects Taipei, Kaohsiung ~5% of days, occasional in winter, severely impacting health, indoor shelter advised

example.zh: 台北市與高雄市（冬季重度污染）
example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (winter heavy pollution)

description.zh: 煙霧由交通與工業排放造成，AQI 100-150，濕度70-80%，影響台北約10%天數，冬季（12-2月）常見，影響能見度與健康
description.en: Smog from traffic and industrial emissions, AQI 100-150, 70-80% humidity, affects Taipei ~10% of days, common in winter (Dec-Feb), impacting visibility and health

example.en: Taipei City (winter smog)

description.zh: 高PM2.5濃度>35µg/m³，AQI>100，濕度70-80%，影響台北、高雄約15%天數，冬季頻發，增加呼吸道疾病風險
description.en: High PM2.5 concentration >35µg/m³, AQI>100, 70-80% humidity, affects Taipei, Kaohsiung ~15% of days, frequent in winter, increasing respiratory disease risks

example.en: Taipei City and Kaohsiung City (winter PM2.5)

description.zh: 塵霾由沙塵造成，能見度2-5公里，AQI 100-150，濕度50-60%，影響台南約3%天數，乾季（11-3月）偶發，影響空氣品質
description.en: Dust haze from sand/dust, visibility 2-5 km, AQI 100-150, 50-60% humidity, affects Tainan ~3% of days, occasional in dry season (Nov-Mar), impacting air quality

example.en: Tainan City (dry season dust haze)

description.zh: 花粉激增於春季（3-4月），花粉濃度>100粒/m³，濕度65-75%，影響台北約10%天數，增加過敏症狀
description.en: Pollen surge in spring (Mar-Apr), pollen >100 grains/m³, 65-75% humidity, affects Taipei ~10% of days, increasing allergy symptoms

example.en: Taipei City (spring pollen surge)

description.zh: 乾季天氣（11-3月）降雨量50-100毫米/月，雲覆蓋30-50%，影響台南、屏東，晴朗天數約60%，利於農業與旅遊
description.en: Dry season weather (Nov-Mar) with 50-100 mm/month rainfall, 30-50% cloud cover, affects Tainan, Pingtung, ~60% clear days, ideal for agriculture and tourism

example.en: Tainan City and Pingtung County (dry season)

description.zh: 濕季天氣（5-9月）降雨量200-400毫米/月，雲覆蓋70-90%，影響宜蘭、台北，颱風頻發，影響交通與農業
description.en: Wet season weather (May-Sep) with 200-400 mm/month rainfall, 70-90% cloud cover, affects Yilan, Taipei, frequent typhoons, impacting traffic and agriculture

example.en: Yilan County and Taipei City (wet season)

description.zh: 季風過渡期（4-5月，10月）天氣多變，降雨量100-200毫米/月，雲覆蓋50-70%，影響台北、台中，影響戶外計畫
description.en: Monsoon transition (Apr-May, Oct) with variable weather, 100-200 mm/month rainfall, 50-70% cloud cover, affects Taipei, Taichung, impacting outdoor plans

example.zh: 台北市與台中市（季風過渡）
example.en: Taipei City and Taichung City (monsoon transition)

description.zh: 春季（3-4月）天氣多變，氣溫15-25°C，降雨量100-150毫米/月，影響台北約50%天數，影響農業與旅遊計畫
description.en: Spring (Mar-Apr) with variable weather, temperatures 15-25°C, 100-150 mm/month rainfall, affects Taipei ~50% of days, impacting agriculture and tourism plans

example.en: Taipei City (spring variable weather)

description.zh: 秋季（9-11月）天氣穩定，氣溫20-28°C，降雨量50-100毫米/月，影響台南約60%天數，利於戶外活動
description.en: Autumn (Sep-Nov) with stable weather, temperatures 20-28°C, 50-100 mm/month rainfall, affects Tainan ~60% of days, ideal for outdoor activities

example.en: Tainan City (autumn stable weather)

description.zh: 冬季（12-2月）天氣涼爽，氣溫10-20°C，降雨量100-200毫米/月，影響台北、新北約70%天數，東北季風帶來降雨
description.en: Winter (Dec-Feb) with cool weather, temperatures 10-20°C, 100-200 mm/month rainfall, affects Taipei, New Taipei ~70% of days, northeast monsoon brings rain

example.zh: 台北市與新北市（冬季涼爽）
example.en: Taipei City and New Taipei City (winter cool weather)

description.zh: 彩虹由雨後陽光折射形成，影響宜蘭約10-20次/年，濕季（5-9月）常見，濕度80-90%，吸引旅遊觀光
description.en: Rainbows form from sunlight refraction post-rain, affecting Yilan ~10-20 times/year, common in wet season (May-Sep), 80-90% humidity, attracting tourism

example.en: Yilan County (post-rain rainbow)

description.zh: 日暈由卷雲折射陽光形成，影響台南約5-10次/年，乾季（11-3月）常見，濕度60-70%，預示天氣變化
description.en: Solar halos form from cirrus clouds refracting sunlight, affecting Tainan ~5-10 times/year, common in dry season (Nov-Mar), 60-70% humidity, indicating weather changes

example.en: Tainan City (dry season solar halo)

description.zh: 月暈由卷雲折射月光形成，影響台南約3-5次/年，乾季（11-3月）夜晚，濕度60-70%，預示降雨可能
description.en: Moon halos form from cirrus clouds refracting moonlight, affecting Tainan ~3-5 times/year, dry season (Nov-Mar) nights, 60-70% humidity, indicating possible rain

example.en: Tainan City (dry season moon halo)

description.zh: 海市蜃樓由熱空氣折射形成，影響台南沿海<1次/年，乾季（11-3月）高溫天，濕度50-60%，吸引觀光
description.en: Mirages form from hot air refraction, affecting Tainan coasts <1 time/year, dry season (Nov-Mar) hot days, 50-60% humidity, attracting tourism

example.en: Tainan City coast (mirage)

description.zh: 暮光輝由日落散射形成，影響高雄約20-30次/年，乾季（11-3月）晴朗傍晚，濕度60-70%，提升旅遊體驗
description.en: Twilight glow from sunset scattering, affects Kaohsiung ~20-30 times/year, dry season (Nov-Mar) clear evenings, 60-70% humidity, enhancing tourism

example.en: Kaohsiung City (dry season twilight glow)

description.zh: 閃電精靈為高空雷暴閃光，影響台北<1次/年，夏季（5-9月）雷雨夜，濕度80-90%，需專業觀測
description.en: Lightning sprites are high-altitude thunderstorm flashes, affecting Taipei <1 time/year, summer (May-Sep) thunderstorm nights, 80-90% humidity, requiring professional observation

example.en: Taipei City (thunderstorm sprite)
